name: SWEETSPOOKS
description:
Explore a small quiet town full of innocent children to scare. But be careful! Scare them too much and they'll go running home, taking YOUR fun with them!

SWEETSPOOKS is a simple, local score attack game where players take control of a ghost, who is very intent on scaring children into dropping their candy. The more candy the player collects, the higher their score!

This game was developed in ~40 hours for my YouTube series Let's Dev. If you'd like to see how it was created, and the ideas/thoughts behind some of the design, be sure to give the four-part series a watch here (Spoiler warning for the final episode in the playlist!): https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOZiUKLr92kHhw90C3WY3KXMymrmi-lXa

Thank you for your interest in SWEETSPOOKS and I hope you enjoy it!
